versions.name: KindredCommands

versions.description: Command framework for developers to easily create universal commands for their plugins.

versions.description: BepInEx pack for V Rising. Preconfigured and includes Unity Base DLLs.

versions.name: CrimsonBanned
versions.description: Ban Moderation Tool: Chat, Voice, Server

versions.name: CrimsonFAQ
versions.description: AutoResponse System

versions.name: CrimsonDropRate
versions.description: Modifies the item group drop rate, not the item quantity drop

versions.name: CrimsonSQL
versions.description: Framework for Interfacing MySQL

versions.name: JSONRising
versions.description: GUI JSON Editor for V Rising Mods

versions.name: AutoBrazier
versions.description: Automatically turn braziers on/off with day/night cycle

versions.name: CrimsonMoon
versions.description: A sacraficial alter to praise the moon! Honor it in return for a blood moon!

versions.name: ClientUI
versions.description: ClientUI to display progress bars for XP mods

versions.name: XPRising
versions.description: Server mod that exchanges item gear level for an XP levelling system

versions.name: XPShared
versions.description: Mod to enable communication between XPRising and XPRising.ClientUI

versions.name: CrimsonLog
versions.description: Logging for Moderation

versions.name: Eclipse
versions.description: Client companion mod for Bloodcraft!

versions.name: TLBVRisingPack
versions.description: Modpack for The Lost Boys Discord Group for Real Gamers

versions.name: Bloodcraft
versions.description: Leveling, expertise, legacies, professions, familiars, classes, quests!

versions.name: KindredLogistics
versions.description: Inventory management mod. Stashing, craftpulling, finding chests, etc.

versions.name: KindredSchematics
versions.description: Commands to build, create, save and load schematics

versions.name: OfflineRaidGuard
versions.description: Stops offline raiding, scopes to either clan or player requirements

versions.name: Gator_Bounty
versions.description: Bounty System for VRising

versions.name: KindredPortals
versions.description: Expand your V Rising fast travel options. Also Map Icons

versions.name: BloodyBoss
versions.description: BloodyBoss is a mod for V Rising that allows you to create VBlood world bosses with random rewards that can be set for each of the world bosses.

versions.name: CrimsonQuest
versions.description: Questing System

versions.name: Sanguis
versions.description: Reward players for being online with optional daily login bonus!

versions.name: BloodyEncounters
versions.description: A server side mod for V Rising which spawns a random NPC near a random online player at random intervals, and the player wins a random item reward if the NPC is killed within the given time limit.

versions.name: BloodyWallet
versions.description: This framework is designed to add a virtual currency to VRising. This opens up a world of possibilities for other mods to integrate with it and serve as a bridge for other mods to use this functionality.

versions.name: CrimsonHunt
versions.description: Create battle-pass like rewards for V Blood hunting

versions.name: Protector
versions.description: Whitelist based access control for V Rising

versions.name: RaidGuard
versions.description: Highly discourages teaming during active castle raids with optional alliance features.

versions.name: BloodyRewards
versions.description: Rewards System for VRising.

versions.name: SoulPvEServerClientModPack1
versions.description: All Client Sided Mods For Soul PvE server.

versions.name: JewelCreator
versions.description: Server side only mod that allows you to create your own jewels with your chosen skill and skill modifier.

versions.name: ShardExtraLife
versions.description: Server side only mod to change shards params like is: durability, time to break, destroy when broken and drop amount.

versions.name: CoffinSleep
versions.description: A VRising mod that speeds up time while you sleep in your coffin.

versions.name: BloodyShop
versions.description: Mod to create a store in VRising.

versions.name: BloodyMailBox
versions.description: The BloodyMailBox mod for VRising allows users to receive messages and receive notifications of new messages even when they are offline.

versions.name: BloodyPoint
versions.description: Mod so that personal or global waypoints can be created.

versions.name: BloodyMerchant
versions.description: BloodyMerchant is a mod designed for V Rising, offering the capability to create custom in-game merchants, adding a layer of dynamic and immersive gameplay.

versions.name: Notify
versions.description: A mod that notifies when a user connects or disconnects from the server, new user connect from the server, when a player kills a VBlood boss, Message of the day system and auto announce system that runs every certain interval.

versions.name: BloodyCore
versions.description: Bloody.Core a help library for mod development. It must be installed if any mod uses it.

versions.name: VRisingDiscordBotCompanion
versions.description: A companion mod for DarkAtra's v-rising-discord-bot.

versions.name: AutoCloseDoors
versions.description: Mod to automatically close doors after a few seconds.

versions.name: StarterKit
versions.description: Server side only mod that allows you to issue different starter kits to new vampires.

versions.name: KindredArenas
versions.description: Sets PvP protection buff in designated zones.

versions.name: MuteChatPlayer
versions.description: Server side only mod which allows server admins to prohibit a specific player from sending messages to the chat.

versions.name: BetterMissions
versions.description: An VRising mod to do a better control of the servant missions.

versions.name: SkanksAIO
versions.description: V Rising server mod that adds a discord server link, a web server with interactive map, and a few other things like admin commands etc.

versions.name: BloodRefill
versions.description: A server-side only mod that allows players to refill their blood pool in different ways.

versions.name: SpiderKiller
versions.description: Mod that kills spiders in a range around you and your friends. So you don't have to fight those pesky things!

versions.name: CrimsonFOV
versions.description: Modifies the client camera field of view

versions.name: RemoveVersionWatermark
versions.description: Removes version watermark

versions.name: SmartConnect
versions.description: Automatically continues (last played) or joins (server address) based on configured options from the main menu!

versions.name: Nocturnes
versions.description: Reward players for being online with optional daily login bonus.
